channel.title: Old butterscape source issues
channel.description:
haven't done a 317 in ages, need help.... The player savegames in the 317 butterscape source isn't saving the way i want it. It's saving in the .dat format (like in a 508) BUT you cannot see the ranking and the stats part of it. IMO 317 is dead, and i don't even thinks this is real butterscape either :P it looks more a like an old paladin source... Just... help...
for those of you who know me as a coding expert HOW MANY TIMES DO I SAY THIS! I work with 508's ONLY, and .dat has really nothing to do with Java except with some source coding.
